				<h3 class="text-center text-uppercase font-weight-bold mb-4 pb-2">The Time is Now!</h3>
				<p>TheBlackTube.com isn’t just a video platform—it’s a kingdom, a content revolution in digital media. For five years, we have fought relentlessly to build and sustain a space where creators can thrive without fear of censorship or exploitation. But now, we need YOU.</p>
				<p>This is your chance to be part of something bigger—to stand with us, to stand for independent creators, and to ensure that our voices are never silenced again.</p>
				<p class="m-0">The time is now. Take action. Join, support, and help keep TheBlackTube alive and thriving!</p>

		<div class="py-5">
			<div class="">
				<h3 class="text-center text-uppercase font-weight-bold mb-4 pb-2">Who We Are</h3>
				<p>TheBlackTube.com was founded by <b>Ap 1nabillion and Dangerus Diva</b>, visionary content creators, entrepreneurs, and pioneers in the digital media space. This power couple has been happily married for <b>17 years</b> and are proud parents of kid influencers <b>ItsJFunk and Miracle Baby Josiah</b>. With a combined <b>10 billion views across digital platforms</b>, they built a thriving multimedia empire and amassed <b>over 500 million views</b> on their <b>So in Love Family YouTube channel</b>.</p>
				<p>Despite their massive success, they—like many other independent creators—faced <b>unjust censorship, demonetization, and ultimately, the removal of their highly successful channel</b>. Anticipating the need for a creator-first platform, they <b>founded TheBlackTube.com two years before their channel’s removal</b>. Instead of accepting defeat, they <b>turned adversity into action</b>, creating a space designed to <b>empower content creators, especially those who have been marginalized, silenced, or unfairly treated on mainstream platforms</b>.</p>
				<p class="m-0"><b>TheBlackTube.com is more than just a platform—it’s a content revolution in digital media. It’s a space where creators are truly in control of their content, their revenue, and their future.</b></p>

	<div class="container">
		<div class="py-5">
			<div class="">
				<h3 class="text-center text-uppercase font-weight-bold mb-4 pb-2">Why We Created This Platform</h3>
				<p>TheBlackTube.com was <b>birthed out of necessity</b>. We witnessed firsthand how mainstream platforms <b>exploit, demonetize, and censor creators—especially people of color</b>. Instead of begging for a seat at the table, <b>we built our own</b>.</p>
				<p class="m-0">TheBlackTube is a <b>creator-first platform</b> that ensures everyone has an opportunity to share their voice, <b>monetize their content fairly, and build their own digital empire without fear of being erased</b>. Over the past <b>five years</b>, we have <b>self-funded every aspect</b> of this platform, but now, we need <b>your help to grow and sustain it</b>.</p>
			</div>
		</div>

	modules: [EffectPanorama],
	effect: 'panorama',
	slidesPerView: 2,spaceBetween: 15,
	breakpoints: {
		480: {
			slidesPerView: 3,
			spaceBetween: 20
		},
		840: {
			slidesPerView: 4,
			spaceBetween: 20
		},
		980: {
			slidesPerView: 5,
			spaceBetween: 25
		},
		1240: {
			slidesPerView: 6,
			spaceBetween: 25
		},
	},
	centeredSlides: true,
	autoplay: {
		delay: 1200,
		disableOnInteraction: false,
		pauseOnMouseEnter: true,
	},
	panoramaEffect: {
		depth: 200,
		rotate: 15,
	},
	loop: true,
	speed: 700,
	allowTouchMove: false,
});
